Short: [IHE PHARM White Paper] Logical Model for pharmaceutical advice
Definition: Pharmaceutical advice relates to one or more prescription items of one prescription. It is issued by one pharmacist. It may be associated with one or more observations.

Short: The person for which the medication is prescribed.
Definition: The person for which the medication is prescribed.

Short: A problem can be a supply problem (suspended medication, out-of-stock...) or a medical issue (redundancy, interaction, contra-indication, overdose, adverse effect...)
Definition: A problem can be a supply problem (suspended medication, out-of-stock...) or a medical issue (redundancy, interaction, contra-indication, overdose, adverse effect...)

Short: Summary of physician/pharmacist discussion (by phone, mail, messages…)
Definition: Summary of physician/pharmacist discussion (by phone, mail, messages…)

Short: Decision (i.e. dispense without change | dispense with changes | refusal to dispense until further discussion with prescriber | definite cancellation of the prescription item)
Definition: Decision (i.e. dispense without change | dispense with changes | refusal to dispense until further discussion with prescriber | definite cancellation of the prescription item)
